exp.description: RoboSats node for development and experimentation. This is the original RoboSats coordinator operated by the RoboSats devs since 2022.

policies.Experimental: Experimental coordinator used for development. Use at your own risk.
policies.Dispute Policy: Evidence in Disputes: In the event of a dispute, users will be asked to provide transaction-related evidence. This could include transaction IDs, screenshots of payment confirmations, or other pertinent transaction records. Personal information or unrelated transaction details should be redacted to maintain privacy.
policies.Non eligible countries: USA citizens and residents are not allowed to use the Experimental coordinator. F2F transactions are explicitly blocked at creation time for US locations. If a US citizen or resident violates this rule and is found out to be using the Experimental coordinator during a dispute process, they will be denied further service and the dispute mediation will be terminated.

temple.description: I am passionate about joining Robosats as a coordinator because I believe that peer-to-peer, non-KYC Bitcoin transactions are vital for the community's empowerment and autonomy. I aim to champion users' privacy, and provide a seamless experience for genuine Bitcoin enthusiasts.
temple.motto: Privacy and Integrity: Temple of Sats, where Bitcoin's essence thrives.

policies.Evidence in Disputes: In the event of a dispute, users will be asked to provide transaction-related evidence. This could include transaction IDs, screenshots of payment confirmations, or other pertinent transaction records. Personal information or unrelated transaction details should be redacted to maintain privacy.
policies.Short-term Storage: Sensitive information related to disputes will be stored only for the duration necessary to resolve the issue. Once resolved, the data will be permanently deleted. For ease of use e-mail communications are permitted, but E2EE and decentralized platforms such as NOSTR, SIMPLEX and MATRIX are advised.
policies.No Third-Party Sharing: Under no circumstances will user information be shared with third parties.
policies.Short-term storage: Any log needed to operate the coordinator will be cleared after 7 days, unless strictly needed to process disputes. To ensure utmost privacy, the coordinator will be accessible only through TOR.
policies.Rule 1:: Do not share personal information through the chat, unless strictly needed for completing the trade.
policies.Rule 2:: Keep stacking Sats and Enjoy your journey in the Temple of Sats!

satstralia.description: I'm happy to be part of Robosats in so many ways!

policies.Privacy Policy 1: Evidence in Disputes: In the event of a dispute, users will be asked to provide transaction-related evidence. This could include transaction IDs, screenshots of payment confirmations, or other pertinent transaction records. Personal information or unrelated transaction details should be redacted to maintain privacy.
policies.Privacy Policy 2: Short-term Storage: Sensitive information related to disputes will be stored only for the duration necessary to resolve the issue. Once resolved, the data will be permanently deleted. For ease of use e-mail communications are permitted, but E2EE and decentralized platforms such as NOSTR, SIMPLEX and MATRIX are advised.
policies.Data Policy 1: No Third-Party Sharing: Under no circumstances will user information be shared with third parties.
policies.Data Policy 2: Short-term Storage: Any log needed to operate the coordinator will be cleared after 7 days, unless strictly needed to process disputes. To ensure utmost privacy, the coordinator will be accessible only through TOR.
policies.Rule 1:: Do not share personal information through the chat, unless strictly needed for completing the trade.
policies.Rule 2:: Any dispute can be fist address through our public chats in the different social networks but never will be started using private chats.

lake.description: Becoming a RoboSats coordinator represents boosting intrinsic values of decentralization and economic freedom. RoboSats solves the problem of KYC and loss of privacy that big Exchanges are forced to comply with. I believe that decentralizing the lightning nodes will enhance the robustness of the tool, allowing more users to join. I am excited to be part of this new phase of growth.
lake.motto: TheBigLake: The Lake of Economic Freedom.

veneto.description: Nati come gruppo di informatici con esperienze diverse, scoperti i bitcoin a fine 2013 ci siamo entusiasmati e dedicati al bitcoin, alla blockchain ed alle criptovalute in generale, in particolare aiutando, informando e seguendo nel percorso di alfabetizzazione nel mondo della valuta digitale tutte le Aziende ed i privati che negli ultimi anni ci hanno dato la loro fiducia.
veneto.motto: Le Tue Guide NON Virtuali su Bitcoin, Blockchain e Crypto. In Veneto.

local.description: This coordinator will only be available if you run a RoboSats coordinator on your own machine.
